Author: unsuspiciousduck6
Text: These always help me keep my electrlytes up so I donÂ´t faint while fasting:  Sodium: 1/2tsp Iodized Salt  Potassium 3,500mg  Magnesium 500mg: .5-1tsp food grade Epsom salts  Calcium 1,000mg  Iron \~16-18mg  Take iron with d3 3 hrs after drinking the mixture above without calcium as it interferes with absorption  Of course things like coconut water fruit juice are always more effective!
